result.name: mud-hole-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Mud Hole rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015): 
Cruise: mdhl_afbini Date: 9th Feb 2012 - 20th Feb 2012 Data collected: MB 
Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% (AFBI) MB Backscatter Coverage 
(Contractor): 100% (AFBI) SS Coverage : None acquired to date Video and Stills 
Samples to date: 21 video transects; no stills analysed - Usable PSA Samples 
to date: 22 Infauna Samples to date: 22
